raw: * This class performs the auto flush of all layout relevant queues.
* @require(qx.event.handler.UserAction)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class performs the auto flush of all layout relevant queues.

raw: * @type {Boolean} Whether a flush was scheduled
* @type {Boolean} true, if the flush should not be executed

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Boolean} true, if the flush should not be executed

raw: * @type {Map} Internal data structure for the current job list

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Map} Internal data structure for the current job list

raw: * @type {Integer} Counts how often a flush failed due to exceptions

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Integer} Counts how often a flush failed due to exceptions

raw: * @type {Integer} Maximum number of flush retries
* Schedule a deferred flush of all queues.
* @param job {String} The job, which should be performed. Valid values are
* layout, decoration and element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Schedule a deferred flush of all queues.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: job {String} The job, which should be performed. Valid values are layout, decoration and element.
@param.description: The job, which should be performed. Valid values are layout, decoration and element.

raw: * Flush all layout queues in the correct order. This function is called
* deferred if {@link #scheduleFlush} is called.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flush all layout queues in the correct order. This function is called deferred if {@link #scheduleFlush} is called.

raw: * Executes the callback code. If the callback throws an error the current
* flush is cleaned up and rescheduled. The finally code is called after the
* callback even if it has thrown an exception.
* @signature function(callback, finallyCode)
* @param callback {Function} the callback function
* @param finallyCode {Function} function to be called in the finally block

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Executes the callback code. If the callback throws an error the current flush is cleaned up and rescheduled. The finally code is called after the callback even if it has thrown an exception.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: finallyCode {Function} function to be called in the finally block
@param.description: function to be called in the finally block

raw: * Handler used on touch devices to prevent the queue from manipulating
* the dom during the touch - mouse - ... event sequence. Usually, iOS
* devices fire a click event 300ms after the touchend event. So using
* 500ms should be a good value to be on the save side. This is necessary
* due to the fact that the event chain is stopped if a manipulation in
* the DOM is done.
* @param e {qx.event.type.Data} The user action data event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler used on touch devices to prevent the queue from manipulating the dom during the touch - mouse - â€¦ event sequence. Usually, iOS devices fire a click event 300ms after the touchend event. So using 500ms should be a good value to be on the save side. This is necessary due to the fact that the event chain is stopped if a manipulation in the DOM is done.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Data} The user action data event.
